CustomField.description: This field is optional and can be collected as part of a workflow. If true, the party passed as the Owner of the IRA is deceased. It is typically used in situations where the IRA owner has died but a formal beneficiary IRA has not been created.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If true the party passed as the Owner of the IRA is deceased. Typically used in connection with situations where the IRA Owner has died but a formal Beneficiary IRA has not been created.
CustomField.label: Owner Deceased Indicator
